remarks: Construct a bijection on a Cartesian product given bijections on the factors.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)
statement:
xpf1o.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> X ) : A -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
xpf1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( y e. C |-> Y ) : C -1-1-onto-> D ) $.
xpf1o $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A , y e. C |-> <. X , Y >. ) : ( A X. C ) -1-1-onto-> ( B X. D ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d C x y $.
$d D y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y x $.
